Html:
Hi Jaimie!

What can you say about the compatibility with CRM 2015?
I'm interested in the approximate release date.

Hi There.

The current release should work with CRM 2015, but it is not "officially" supported as I only used a demo version of CRM 2015 to develop and test. To support RTM version of CRM 2015, I am looking at a April release.

Hopefully I would find a bit more time to do a proper testing for CRM 2015.

Kind Regards,
Jaimie

Jaimie,

I downloaded the zip files and attempted to import them into a CRM 2015 environment that I am working on. I get an error that says "You can only import solutions with a package version of 7.0 or earlier into this organization. Also, you can't import any solutions into this organization that were exported from CRM 2011 or earlier." Am I importing the wrong version of the XrmServiceToolkit?

Thanks,
Kevan
